resources.string: This Add-on MUST be used with “Dolphin Browser” which is available on Google Play.

Dont launch this application directly. Open any site in Dolphin Browser, swype right edge to left, tap to "Stylish" icon and then "Find styles for current site". Choose any userstyle, and click to green "Install" button. Return to tab with your site and you will see the changes. This addon has the same functions as the Stylish for Firefox and Chrome on a PC.
Trouble with file writing. Try one more time.
